There are books available on almost every subject, so you can easily find something that interests you.`),mdx("h2",null,"Write down everything that interests you."),mdx("p",null,`If you have a topic that you want to explore in depth and want to know more about it, then you can write down your thoughts, ideas and questions related to the topic in a journal or notebook.

You can also talk to people who work in the field that interests you and learn from their experiences.
